mapper.insert: insert into student(student_id, student_name, student_email, student_address, student_phone_number, student_grade, student_admission_year, password, major_id) values(#{student.studentId}, #{student.name},#{student.email},#{student.address}, #{student.phoneNumber}, #{student.grade}, #{student.admissionYear}, #{student.password}, #{student.majorId})
mapper.update: update student set student_name = #{student.name}, student_email = #{student.email}, student_address = #{student.address}, student_phone_number = #{student.phoneNumber}, student_admission_year = #{student.admissionYear}, student_grade = #{student.grade}
